title: IM&P Wellness Center - Citrus County Doctor's Office
description: Dr. Wilson is a primary doctor and pediatrician who also offers weight loss, Botox®, Juvederm®, Laser Hair Removal, Spider Vein Removal, and Clinical Cosmetics among other skincare packages.
cleaned_text: As a primary care physician, Dr. Wilson incorporates safe alternative therapies as needed at the Crystal River Medical Center so your entire family can have truly holistic healthcare from a single provider. Besides being a primary doctor and pediatrician, Dr. Wilson offers weight loss, Botox®, Juvederm®, Laser Hair Removal, Laser Skin Removal, Spider Vein Removal and Clinical Cosmetics at our Crystal River Medical Center. Our goal is to empower you to make the best healthcare decisions for your family, allowing you to remain well so you can enjoy all aspects of your life.
